Name: Dig
Effect: Single Target. Charge Move. Out of Range while Charging. Vulnerable while charging to: 'Earth Power', 'Earthquake', 'Fissure', 'Magnitude', 'Stomping Tantrum'. Out of battle, allows the Pok√©mon to burrow and make underground tunnels.
Description: The user digs a tunnel through the ground and attacks while coming out from below its target. This move has been used to escape caves and gain access to highly-surveiled places.
